statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND sender_address = '123 Main Street';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE receiver_address = '456 Elm Street' AND amount < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM regulatory_audit WHERE audit_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM regulatory_audit WHERE reason = 'fraud' AND auditor = 'John Doe');
